  • Field Details

    • m_ContextClassLoader

      private final ClassLoader m_ContextClassLoader
      The context ClassLoader for the new threads. Can be null.

    • m_InheritThreadLocals

      private final boolean m_InheritThreadLocals
      If true, inherit initial values for inheritable thread-locals from the constructing thread, otherwise no initial values are inherited.

    • m_IsDaemon

      private final boolean m_IsDaemon
      true if the new threads are daemon thread, false otherwise.

    • m_NameCounter

      private final AtomicInteger m_NameCounter
      The counter for the thread name.

    • m_NameFactory

      private final IntFunction<String> m_NameFactory
      The factory method for the thread names.

    • m_Priority

      private final int m_Priority
      The priority for the new threads. A value of -1 indicates that no priority will be set explicitly.

    • m_StackSize

      private final long m_StackSize
      The desired stack size for the new threads, or zero to indicate that this parameter is to be ignored.

    • m_ThreadGroup

      private final ThreadGroup m_ThreadGroup
      The thread group for the new threads. Can be null.

    • m_UncaughtExceptionHandler

      private final Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler m_UncaughtExceptionHandler
      The uncaught exception handler for the new threads; can be null.

  • Constructor Details

    • ThreadFactoryImpl

      public ThreadFactoryImpl(IntFunction<String> nameFactory, ThreadGroup threadGroup, long stackSize, boolean inheritThreadLocals, ClassLoader contextClassLoader, boolean isDaemon, int priority, Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler uncaughtExceptionHandler)
      Creates a new instance of ThreadFactoryImpl.
      Parameters:
      nameFactory - The factory method for the thread names.
      threadGroup - The thread group for the new thread; can be null.
      stackSize - The desired stack size for the new threads, or zero to indicate that this parameter is to be ignored.
      inheritThreadLocals - If true, inherit initial values for inheritable thread-locals from the constructing thread, otherwise no initial values are inherited.
      contextClassLoader - The context class loader for the new threads; can be null.
      isDaemon - true if the new threads are daemon threads, false otherwise.
      priority - The priority for the new threads. A value of -1 indicates that no priority will be set explicitly.
      uncaughtExceptionHandler - The handler for uncaught exceptions for the new threads; can be null.
